entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Channel-Port aux Basques
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port aux Basques 4:08 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.5°C
Wind: E 30 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog. Amount 5 mm except 15 mm in areas of heaviest rain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Wreckhouse area overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: A few showers or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 08 May 2016
